title: A Union free seminar
creator_credit: Laszlo Barna, Laura Alper, Barrie Howells, Mark Zannis and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Techniques for union-proofing the workplace are presented in a concise, straightforward manner by Charles Hughes, management consultant and guru of the North American union-free movement. Excerpted from one of his popular management seminars, this film, and the information Hughes presents in it, will draw the attention of both union organizers and management.
